subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Rod Brind’Amour scored with 6 minutes 5 seconds left in the third period and the host Carolina Hurricanes beat the Rangers, 2-1, Wednesday night despite Jaromir Jagr’s 599th career goal.
snippet: Rod Brind’Amour scored with 6 minutes 5 seconds left in the third period and the host Carolina Hurricanes beat the Rangers, 2-1, Wednesday night despite Jaromir Jagr’s 599th career goal.
